description: Try our easy to follow Fresh Figs With Cassis Cream recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Fruit pudding,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Soy free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Fresh Figs With Cassis Cream Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Make a cross in the top of each fig (but don’t cut all the way to the bottom), then gently prise it open. Place 3 figs in each of 4 dessert dishes and drizzle with crème de cassis.
Mix the mascarpone with a drizzle of cassis and stir gently until lightly marbled. Add a spoonful of mascarpone to each dish and serve.
